amendment.description: Amendment adds language which provides for the consideration of the bill (S. 2578) to amend title 31 of the United States Code to increase the public debt limit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide for the consideration of S. 2578. The bill shall be considered as read for amendment; the previous question shall be considered as ordered to final passage without intervening motion except: (1) hour of debate on the bill and one motion to commit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Myrick amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 211 (Roll no. 275).
